description: A unique archipelago composed of enormous mangrove trees, located near the Red Line. The island serves as the final stop in Paradise before entering the New World.

keyMoments.title: Marines Mobilize on Sabaody
keyMoments.description: The Marines mobilize their forces across Sabaody Archipelago, with Sentomaru and Pacifistas arriving to confront what they believe are the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the confrontation between the Marines and both real and fake Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Fake Straw Hats Recruit at Grove 46
keyMoments.description: The Fake Straw Hat crew successfully recruits numerous rookie pirates at Grove 46, including Caribou, Coribou, Albion, and Lip Doughty.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how the Straw Hat name has become legendary enough to attract powerful pirates.

features.description: The archipelago is divided into 79 numbered groves, each with different purposes and establishments.
Ships can be coated here to travel underwater to Fish-Man Island.

description: The second ship of the Straw Hat Pirates, built by Franky using treasure from the Franky Family and Adam Wood. A brigantine-rigged sloop-of-war with a lion figurehead.

keyMoments.title: Robin and Franky Meet at Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: Robin arrives at the fully coated Thousand Sunny and reunites with Franky, who has been preparing the ship for the journey to the New World.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the ship is ready for underwater travel to Fish-Man Island.

statusHistory.description: Ship has been coated for underwater travel

features.description: The ship has been fully coated by Rayleigh, allowing it to travel underwater to Fish-Man Island.
